    ❤
    {{cloth.price|currency}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ClothesService} from "../services/clothes/clothes.service"; import {Clothes} from "../shared/models/Clothes"; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { clothes: Clothes[] = []; constructor(private clothesService: ClothesService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.clothes = this.clothesService.getAll(); } }
